did.unittitle: Senate Appointments - Congressional Record, Daily Digest, 6 February 1952: Bills Introduced, Bills Reported, Committee Meetings - Appointment of Senate Members to the Military Academies - Appointment to Represent the Senate in the Capitol Sesquicentennial Commission - Appointments to the Legislative Branch - 1951 Expiration of the International Agreement With Mexico, Need for Representation of the Committee of Labor and Public Welfare, Import of Foreign Workers - Appointments as International Wheat Council Delegates, Senators H.A. Smith, C.W. Tobey, Foreign Relations Committee, K.T. Hutchison, Secretary of Agriculture - World Health Organization (WHO) Assembly, Appointment of Congressional Advisors; Proposals for Agenda, 5 Pages - Committee on the Judiciary, Joint Committee on Immigration and Nationality Policy, Appointments; P. McCarran - R.E. Flanders Appointment to Attend the Commonwealth Parliamentary Association - Appointments to the Committee Investigating the Information Program, Voice of America - S. Res. 74, Re: East-West Propaganda, Freedom of Information - Joint Committee on Atomic Energy Appointment after Death of Senator B. McMahon - Appointments to the Paris Cemetery Ceremonies, Monuments Commission - L. Saltonstall, Committee on Appropriations, Appointment to UNESCO General Conference, Agenda, 11 Pages - Appointment to the Pan American Highway Congress - Appointment to the Joint Committee on Inaugural Ceremonies; Congressional Record Excerpt Re: Appointment During Adjournment - Appointment to the Joint Committee on the Economic Report
